mapper.select: SELECT *, u.user_name AS name, CASE WHEN u.user_id = #{userId} THEN true ELSE false END AS isAuth FROM exhibition_comment ec left join user u on ec.user_id = u.user_id WHERE exhibition_id = #{exhibitionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exhibition_comment (exhibition_id, user_id, stars, content) VALUES (#{exhibitionId}, #{userId}, #{stars}, #{content})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exhibition_comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND exhibition_id = #{exhibitionId} AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(stars) FROM exhibition_comment WHERE exhibition_id = #{exhibitionId}
